plot: The orphans Yeong-ho and Jeong-a are caught pickpocketing an elderly man. Instead of being angry, the man takes pity on them and brings him to his house to raise as his own children.
title: Geuriumeun gaseummada
plot_es: The orphans Yeong-ho and Jeong-a are caught pickpocketing an elderly man. Instead of being angry, the man takes pity on them and brings him to his house to raise as his own children.
plot_en: The orphans Yeong-ho and Jeong-a are caught pickpocketing an elderly man. Instead of being angry, the man takes pity on them and brings him to his house to raise as his own children.
